text: A Hippopotamus declares that you’re frightfully rude
A ghost decides to haunt you for your foreseeable future
You encounter a giraffe. He looks down on you
You just found the world’s undisputed, all time, bestest brunch
You see all your friends…they met up without you…sad face
A garda starts twerking up against you
You find a mirror, it reveals that you’re looking gooood!
You step in Dinosaur poo, AGAIN!
You learn to fly! and then immediately forget
You find a pot of gold…they have chocolate inside
You meet Harrison Ford, he likes your socks
You forget how to turn left
You enter backwards walking mode
You have only one leg left. Let the Hopathon begin!
A bus made of marshmallows runs over your foot. It tickles.
You are a Viking, PILLAGE!
Nobody can see you!!…Nobody.Can.See.You…
You find Monopoly money, its not very useful
You bite your tongue, it tastes like liquorice
The streets are underwater, swim like a fish
You meet Bob, you don’t know who Bob is
